name: LLM CLI (Container)
postCreateCommand: echo 'LLM CLI Dev Container created successfully! Run "llm --help" to get started.'
postStartCommand: bash -lc 'set -e; echo "[llm-container] Versions:"; go version; python3 --version; llm --version; echo "Available LLM models:"; llm models || echo "No models configured yet. Use \"llm models\" to see available models."; echo "To configure API keys, use \"llm keys set <provider>\"";'
